meanings.definition: A person who speaks maliciously about someone behind their back.
meanings.sent1: Some backbiters spread rumors about others in secret.
meanings.sent2: The backbiters in the office were causing a lot of drama.
meanings.sent3: The group of backbiters whispered tales of gossip in the shadows.
meanings.sent4: The backbiters' words were like venomous snakes slithering in the dark.
meanings.sent5: Beware of backbiters, for their tongues can be sharper than knives.
